pr_title: [KEYCLOAK-10675] - Deleting an Identity Provider doesn't remove the associated IdP Mapper for that user

timeline.message: [KEYCLOAK-10675] - Deleting an Identity Provider doesn't remove the associated IdP Mapper for that user

timeline.bodyText: Just minor concern, but from the name of this method, it is not obvious what is is doing... Is it possible to change the method signature to "preRemove(RealmModel, IdentityProviderModel)" to be compatible with all the other similar methods on the UserProvider interface (methods which intercepts removing on some realm object) ? WDYT?
timeline.author: mposolda

replies.bodyText: @mposolda I've also added more assertion to tests.
replies.author: pedroigor
